TravelTriangle > Blog > Meghalaya > 11 Resorts In Meghalaya: Exceptional Staying Options In The Northeastern Region 11 Resorts In Meghalaya: Exceptional Staying Options In The Northeastern Region .. SHARES Updated Date: 18 April 2023 The profligacy of opulence resorts in India in every sense is quite idiosyncratic that cannot be adept anywhere else in the world. If you believe in this notion that a magnificent stay is necessary to make a trip marvelous then there are loads of choices for you in all nook and corners of the country. Meghalaya is one such state that attracts a large number of flocks from all over the world due to its phenomenal elegance. It has resort options in such great numbers that it would confuse you which one is best for you. Depicting the culture and heritage of the place, Resorts in Meghalaya are characterized by a brilliant atmosphere and so do they offer all the amenities and facilities to flatter all of your five senses. Table Of Content 11 Resorts In Meghalaya Below is the list of the top 11 Resorts in Meghalaya that possess all the attributes that make your stay unforgettable. 1. Ri Kynjai Resort, Shillong Ri Kyanji, which means “Serenity By The Lake” is a world-famous lakeside resort that has a well-maintained garden space where you can experience the sheer luxury that surrounds them. The mesmerizing view of Umiam Lake in front has made it one of the best resorts in Meghalaya. The original touch of Khasi Thatch Huts in its design and deep culture of the khasis is the major point of attraction. Forget not to indulge in its lip-smacking dishes at the restaurant in the Resort. Activities and Amenities: Lake View Cottages, Multi-cuisine Restaurant, Bar, Fireplace, Luxurious Rooms with Balcony, Spa and Emporium.Price Range: Starts from INR 9500/- per night.Location: Umniauh Khwan, UCC Road, Ri Bhoi District, Meghalaya.Google Rating: 4.5/5| Trip Advisor Rating: 4.5/5 Must Read: 19 Places To Visit Near Shillong For Experiencing Meghalaya’s True Beauty! Looking To Book A Holiday Package? Spellbinding Cochin Family Tour 2D/1N Package @ Rs 2,750 Plan your trip today! Book Now See more at TRAVELTRIANGLE.COM Visit Website 2. Polo Orchid Resort, Cherrapunjee Nestled amidst the spectacular valley of Cherrapunji, The Polo Orchid Resort offers a great combination of comfort, Style and Unique local flavor. The famous nearby attractions of Cherrapunji including Arwai Caves, Mawsmai Falls, Thangkharang Park, and Nohsngithiang Falls et al are major highlights of this resort. Notably, it is amongst the best resorts in Meghalaya for families. The Resort is known for its different kinds of stay options with amazing views alongside on-site café and restaurant facilities. Activities and Amenities: Restaurant, Bar, Café, Bonfire, Free Wi-Fi and Games.Price Range: Starts from INR 7499/- night.Location: Mawphlang Mawsmai, Near Nohsngithiang, Cherrapunji, Meghalaya.Google Rating: 4.1/5| Trip Advisor Rating: 4/5 Suggested Read: 16 Scenic Waterfalls in Meghalaya That’ll Leave Your Mesmerized 3. Cherrapunjee Holiday Resort, Cherrapunjee Cherrapunjee Holiday Resort is a complete ‘Nature Resort’ run by a Family. The well-landscaped garden is extremely beautiful. Located atop a hill in the picturesque village of Laitkynsew, this resort enjoys an amazing view of green lofty mountains of Meghalaya. During the stay at Cherrapunji Holiday Resort which is considered the best Luxury Resort in Meghalaya, you as a guest will enjoy numerous outdoor activities as well as the buzzing musical evenings. Indulge in some mouthwatering food at the restaurant in the resort that serves local, Indian and Chinese Cuisine. Activities and Amenities: Trekking, Children Play Area, Board Games and Library, Outdoor Picnics, Swimming Pools, River Canoeing, Bird Watching.Price Range: Starts from INR 4499/- per night.Location: Laitkynsew Village, Cherrapunji, Meghalaya.Google Rating: 4.3/5| Trip Advisor Rating: 4/5 Suggested Read: 10 Best Hotels And Resorts In Shillong That Will Entice You To Explore Meghalaya! 4. Sunshine Farms and Resorts, Shillong Sunshine Farms and Resorts has earned a well-deserved status amongst the cheap resorts in Meghalaya as it is a pocket-friendly option. Nestled amidst the splendid beauty of the Meghalayan hills and meadows, it covers a sprawling area of 13.5 acres. Concerning rooms, you can opt for tents or standard villa, each having its luxurious comforts and style. The mesmerizing and romantic views from the windows make guests feel pampered by nature itself. Activities and Amenities: Fireplace, Lounge Room, TV Room, Wood for Bonfire, Perfect Hospitality.Price Range: Starts from INR 1000/- per night.Location: Nonglakhait, Near Bhoirymbong, Ri Bhoi District, Shillong, Meghalaya.Google Rating: 3.9/5| Trip Advisor Rating: 5/5 Suggested Read: The Ever Growing Living Root Bridges, Meghalaya – A Nature’s Marvel In The Northeast Planning your holiday but confused about where to go? And beauty all along Read More See more at TRAVELTRIANGLE.COM Visit Website 5. Sa-I-Mika Resort, Cherrapunjee For people seeking a great holiday flee that too proffers a glimpse into the rich natural serenity of streams, meadows, and crags, Samika Resort is just a place to be. Located in the secluded region of Cherrapunji away from any hustle and bustle of the city life, owed to silence and calmness, this resort provides the best opportunity to enjoy the blissful ambiance. Adventure lovers would get the best out of it as there are numerous adventurous and recreational activities available here. It is unbelievably one of the best resorts in Meghalaya for families. Activities and Amenities: Hiking avenues, Natural strolling, Comfortable rooms, and great hospitality.Price Range: Starts from INR 3500/- per night.Location: Wahshari, Khiliehshnong, Sohra, Cherrapunji, Meghalaya.Google Rating: 4.2/5| Trip Advisor Rating: 4/5 Suggested Read: 20 Best Places To Visit In India During Christmas Holidays For A Grand Celebration 6. Jiva Resort, Cherrapunjee One of the best and finest resort in Meghalaya for couples, Jiva Resort is nestled amidst the heart of the rainiest place on the earth in the lap of clouds where you can embrace unexpected showers of rain with your loved ones. This resort is a well-known spot that provides luxurious rooms and scrumptious recipes. Under the unique world of stars and a whole lot of other activities, this resort opens up to a mesmerizing garden for strolling and its proximity to Sohra Golf Range attracts the adventure aficionados. Activities and Amenities: Jacuzzi, Restaurant, Air-conditioned Suites, Golf Course nearby the Garden area.Price Range: Starts from INR 7000/- per night.Location: Saitsohpen, Near Kutmadan, Cherrapunji, Meghalaya.Google Rating: 4.6/5| Trip Advisor Rating: 5/5 Suggested Read: 35 Exotic Places To Visit In December In India To Enjoy A Surreal Vacation! 7. Kutmadan Resort, Cherrapunjee Step into luxury with a far-fetched stay at the Kutmadan Resort, that is considered the best resort in Meghalaya. This resort is a class in itself that offers a mesmerizing location in the valley of Cherrapunji. Guests staying here can enjoy the tranquility of nearby attractions such as Mawsmai Caves and the Seven Sister Falls. For Lavish meals and lip-smacking sup, this resort has on-site A-Class Restaurant facilitating local and international cuisines. Activities and Amenities: Airport Transfer, Luggage Storage, A-Class Restaurant, Bottled Water, Experienced & Courteous Staffs.Price Range: Starts from INR 3500/- per night.Location: MDR 27, Cherrapunjee, Meghalaya.Google Rating: 4.5/5| Trip Advisor Rating: 4.5/5 Suggested Read: 30 Best Places To Visit In India In January 8. Orchid Lake Resort, Umium Nestled on the banks of magnificent and gigantic Umiam Lake, Orchid Lake Resort is run by the Tourism Department of Umium Sports Complex. Being one of the cheap resorts in Meghalaya, it gives a great holiday retreat and a mesmerizing experience gazing out the unbeatable view of the Lake in front. Activities and Amenities: Trekking, sightseeing, watersports, Comfortable rooms, banquet spaces, Car Rental.Price Range: Starts from INR 1000/- onwards per night.Location: Umium, Meghalaya.Google Rating: 4.1/5| Trip Advisor Rating: 3.5/5 Suggested Read: 29 Monsoon Destinations In India That Will Make You Dance In The Rain 9. Roinam Resort, Borpani Overlooking the beautiful hills of Meghalaya, Roinam Resort offers the wonderful recreational amenities marked by comfort and luxury at a location that enlivens all your senses. Enjoy reading a book in your room balcony and enjoy the sprawling views of the hills of the state. Activities and Amenities: Swimming pool, Lawn access, Cycling, Nature strolling.Price Range: Starts from INR 3800/- per night.Location: Umbir-Mairang Road, Meghalaya.Google Rating: 4.3/5| Trip Advisor Rating: 4.5/5 Suggested Read: 20 Best Places To Visit In North India In Monsoon For That Much Needed Break 10. San Nael La Resort, Meghalaya San Nael La Resort is the coolest resort in Meghalaya near Beach. It offers sights that will make your trip worthwhile here. Providing best aesthetic landscapes of the palm trees, small isolated sliding roof shelters and panoramic views of the nearby Nongkhnum Beach, this resort assures for all the facilities that are sure to leave the guests fully rejuvenated. Activities and Amenities: Children activities, cycling, football, three-day tour program.Price Range: Starts from INR 3500/- per night.Location: Pynshadkhurai-Shella, Sohra, Meghalaya.Google Rating: 4.5/5| Trip Advisor Rating: 4/5 Suggested Read: The Ultimate List of Adventure Holidays In India For Summer 11. Smoky Falls Mae Fi Resort, Tyrna Situated in the Tyrna Village at 7 km from Cherrapunjee, Smoky Falls Mae Fi Resort is an extremely convenient location. You can stay here and get down to Nongriat to have a glimpse of the Rainbow Falls. This wonderful one-hour trail is amazing on that enables you to view the natural serenity. Activities and Amenities: Children Activities, Parking, Pet-Friendly, Trekking, Waterfalls viewpoint.Price Range: Starts from INR 3512/- per night.Location: Tyrna en-route to Nongriat, Tyrna, Meghalaya.Google Rating: 4.3/5| Trip Advisor Rating: 4.5/5 Further Read: 7 Places With Highest Rainfall In India To Be Explored In This Lifetime Get ready to experience luxury on these above mentioned fantabulous resorts by planning your stay there while touring to Meghalaya. Your luxurious stay would be grandeur and comfort rolled into one incredible package. Grab fabulous opportunity to visit Resorts in Meghalaya if you want to get escaped from the urban grind. Frequently Asked Questions About Resorts In Meghalaya What is the price range of resorts in Meghalaya? The price range is between INR999/- to INR 10500/-. Which are the popular luxury resorts in Meghalaya? Ri Kynjai and A Resort By the Lake are luxurious resorts. What are the best Spa Resorts in Meghalaya? Hotel Polo Orchid, Ri Kynjai, Orchid Lake Resort, A Resort by the Lake are considered the best resort options. What are the best cities to stay in Meghalaya? Shillong, Cherrapunjee, Sohar, and Jowai are the best cities for great stays. What is the best time to visit Shillong? September to May is the most ideal time to visit as the weather remains quite pleasant. Looking To Book An International Holiday? Trip to Sri Lanka at Rs 13,500/- Plan Your Vacation Today!
